item.title: Component JSON Model Map
Component JSON Schema Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_component_schema.json Schema version 1.0.0-milestone2 Short name oscal-component The OSCAL Implementation Component format can be used to describe the implementation of controls in a component or a set of components grouped as a capabiity. A component can be either a technical component, or a documentary component. A technical component is a component that is implemented in hardware (physical or virtual) or software. A documentary component is a component implemented in a document, such as a process, proceedure, or policy.
